== User Stories ==
User can: 

Grayson:
  * See campus dining locations in list upon starting the app
  * See sorted list(open vs not, then time till closed) of campus dining locations upon starting the app

Peter: 
  * Hit the menu button to bring up a menu
  * Choose to see all dining locations on a map from a menu
  * See pins on map representing all dining locations

Austin:
  * Click dining location and bring up details pane for that location
  * See hours, menu, and location on location details pane
  * Click a button on location details pane that allows them to open a map
  * See a pin on the map representing the dining location they chose

Future User Stories: 
  * User can see 'specials' aka Rand birthday dinner, etc
  * User can rate dining location
  * User can see nutrition facts on location
